callback_with_context.context_function_id:
Name + {(list = Component("B10C28DC-AFC1-4907-B20296FD966B63E2").UpgradingUnitsContextList) => {this | list.IsEmpty => Loc("warbands_no_unit_selected") | UnitUpgradeManagerContext.UnitUpgradeMainUnitRecordList(list.FirstContext).Contains(this) == false => Loc("warbands_no_connection") } } + GetIfElse(StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignUnitGroupUpgrade").RankRequirementMet == false, "
" + Format(Loc("warbands_rank_required"), StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignUnitGroupUpgrade").RankRequired), "") + GetIfElse(StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignUnitGroupUpgrade").TechRequirementsList.Any(IsRequirementMet == false), "
" + Format(Loc("warbands_tech_required"), StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignUnitGroupUpgrade").TechRequirementsList.FirstContext(IsRequirementMet == false).TechRequiredRecordContext.OnscreenName), "")
